CAD software that specializes in complex geometries and model applications. It can create, edit and analyze a variety of 3D model formats including solids, surfaces, point clouds, meshes and NURBS curves. Not only can it model, but with appropriate plug-ins such as Grasshopper, it can play an integral role in automating the virtual analysis of real-world industry parts.
